title: Spring rolls & Peanutbutter sauce
description: Light, healthy, very convinient to make for a picnic or as snack for a party.
story: I would say itâ€™s both: a healthy and delicious choice. Chicken may be replaced with other cooked meat (e.g. duck, turkey) or with more vegies for vegetarian option.</br></br>Mango maybe substituted with a pineapple or even peach.

ingredients.name: chicken breast
ingredients.preparationNotes: cooked (either boiled or baked or fried)

instructions: Mix everything for a sauce and set aside.
Slice carrot, cucumber, mango and chicken in equal thick straws.
Dip a rice wrapper in hot water (one at a time) and roll vegetables and chicken into it..
If you are taking these rolls to a picnic in a hot summer day, be sure it's packed cold using some ice packs or in a portable fridge.
